reg_info.act_under: Public Sector Labour Relations Transition Act, 1997

content.section: Prescribing date on which transitional period ends
content.content: 1. For the purpose of the definition of “transitional period” in section 2 of the Act, December 31, 2007 is prescribed as the date on which the transitional period ends.  O. Reg. 459/01, s. 1; O. Reg. 384/04, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. For the purpose of the definition of “transitional period” in section 2 of the Act, December 31, 2007 is prescribed as the date on which the transitional period ends.  O. Reg. 459/01, s. 1; O. Reg. 384/04, s. 1.
